Instance.description: Situation used to control the progression a hospital patient goes through when a user Sim is working at the Doctor active career.

Tunable.name: admitted_duration_for_time_jump
Tunable.description: The amount of time allowed to pass before a Sim in the admitted state will be ignored on load with a time jump.

Tunable.name: admitted_role_state
Tunable.description: A reference to the hospital patients admitted role state while in the situation. This is the state where the patient is assigned to a bed and the doctor is actively trying to diagnose the issue.

Tunable.name: diagnosed_duration_for_time_jump
Tunable.description: The amount of time allowed to pass before a Sim in the diagnosed state will be ignored on load with a time jump.

Tunable.name: diagnosed_role_state
Tunable.description: A reference to the hospital patients diagnosed role state while in the situation. This is the state where the patient has been diagnosed but it still waiting for the doctor to treat them.

TunableTuple.name: go_to_diagnosed_interactions
TunableTuple.description: The interactions to look for when a Sim has been diagnosed by a doctor and is now waiting for treatment.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: pre_diagnosed
Tunable.description: If this is true then when the Sim is pre-rolled it will skip to the _DiagnosedState(). If it is False then it will default to pre-rolling the Sim to _AdmittedState().
